name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 282,916 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

spells.description: Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,531 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
